beer.beer_description: This India Pale Ale was crafted to honour the brewing traditions of a beer that journeyed by ship from England to the Indian Colonies, in an era when the ship’s captain wore inked swallows as proof of his sailing prowess. Captain’s IPA is brewed using two specialty malts for a rich toffee flavour with a complex fusion of aroma and bitterness hops to deliver an intense, yet smooth taste. Captain’s IPA goes well with wagyu steak, eye fillet or the classic beef pie.

items.badge_description: We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 265 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 54! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast
Do you come from the land down under, where beer does flow, and men chunder? That's at least 10 different beers from Australia. Try 5 more for Level 3.

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least That's 400 distinct venues!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 305 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 62!
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 210 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 43! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.badge_description: It's New Brew Thursday! Drink any beer you have never had before on three different Thursdays in a 20 day period.

Whether you’re having a room party or hanging at the hotel bar, you know the essential part of any trip, an awesome beer!

That's a beer at 95 different venues categorized as a Hotel! Visit 5 more different ones for Level 20!

items.badge_description: Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 240 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 49!
99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 145 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 30!
Do you come from the land down under, where beer does flow, and men chunder? That's at least 60 different beers from Australia. Try 5 more for Level 13.

items.badge_description: On National Beer Day, adventure waits for no one. Crack open a brew from your local treasure chest, or beer fridge, and strike gold with this limited-edition badge, available today only. Like badges? Check out the Drinking Socially Podcast
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 5 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 2! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast
